value.string: Common activities which happen only once during the statup of a bot
Check on which environment the bot is running, the get the related share_drive value as per the environment value

value.string: Set up Task_Path and Doc_Path and make sure their directories exist
If we were called with a Log_File_Name then use it, otherwise default to "Log_File.csv"
Validate that the root exists.  Otherwise shut down

value.expression:
Select Folder : $Root$
How long would you like to wait for  this condition to be true (in seconds)? : 0

Root path $Root$ is not valid.  
Please correct the issue and restart this process.

value.string: Create Doc_Path if it does not exist
Now add the Application_Name and validate that segment exists
If any of the items in the Subdirectory_List do not exist then create them
1 - Setup,2 - Input,3 - In Process,4 - Output,5 - Logs,6 - Support Docs,7 - Task,8 - Scripts
Create Doc_Path\Year\Month-Day\ subdirectories for the Log and Screenshots
Create Doc_Path\Year\Month-Day\ subdirectories for the Excel and Statistics files

value.expression: $Error-Description$ Exception occurred at line number $Error-LineNumber.Number:toString$. You chose to mark the bot as 'Failed' in case of any encountered errors.
